Name: Embrace of Winds
Title: Venti: Embrace of Winds
Source: Reward for inviting Venti to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Embrace of Winds
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1503]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1503] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S15032]</color> once.
After a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115031]</color> created by your $[A1503], who has this card equipped, is triggered, the next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> performed by your character in this Round will cost 1 less $[K309].
(You must have $[A1503] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C115031.Name: Stormzone
C115031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
